item.title: Record flooding possible in Pacific Northwest as storms continue in Northeast
item.description: An atmospheric river event has been slamming the Pacific Northwest with rain, and the flood threat is far from over.

item.title: WATCH: A 14-year-old running for governor of Vermont
item.description: Vermont is the only state without a minimum age requirement for gubernatorial runs, so Dean Roy created his own party to ensure he gets on the ballot.

item.title: WATCH: Shoppers are paying different prices for same groceries: Study
item.description: A small case study of nearly 200 grocery shoppers in four cities using the Instacart app found three-quarters of the same grocery items were offered a...

item.title: Divided Fed set to announce decision on interest rates
item.description: Inflation has picked up in recent months alongside a hiring slowdown.

item.title: WATCH: 45 million Americans under alerts as new storms take aim
